segment.name: Beginning of message
segment.documentation: BGM, A segment to indicate the type and function of the message and to transmit its identifying number.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to specify the date and, when required, the time of the creation of the message and optionally to specify other process dates which apply to the whole message.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments to specify references which apply to the whole message and optionally to specify related dates.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to specify a reference for the message.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to specify dates related to the reference.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments to identify the parties associated with the message.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the reporting party or to identify the party on behalf of which the declaration is made when the reporting party is a third party.

segment.name: Contact information
segment.documentation: CTA, A segment to identify a person or a department for the party to whom communication should be directed.

segment.name: Communication contact
segment.documentation: COM, A segment to specify a communication number for the party, such as phone number, E-mail address, fax number or X400 address.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation:
FTX, A segment to specify complementary information on the party.
Part 1: direct reporting of transactions via resident bank accounts.
This part of the message specifies the requested information for all the resident bank accounts and for all the accounts held abroad with banks or non-banks and can also be used for reporting about netting operations.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments to accommodate the details relevant to the transactions performed via one account (or a group of accounts) during the relevant period.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment identifying each declaration on an account (or group of accounts).

segment.name: Attribute
segment.documentation: ATT, A segment identifying the type of the reported account.

segment.name: Financial institution information
segment.documentation: FII, A segment identifying the resident's financial institution involved or the non-resident financial institution where the resident's external account is held.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to identify the name and address of related parties such as the resident, the non-resident non-financial institution where the resident's account is held (group or third party company) or the co-holders of a shared account.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment to specify the opening balance or the closing balance of the account for the reported period.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment to specify the currency of the reported account.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments to specify the details of the set of transactions processed via the financial account.

segment.name: Requirements and conditions
segment.documentation: RCS, A segment to specify the reason for the transaction.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify information in clear and free form about the reason for the transaction.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to specify the date of an event related to the transaction, such as processing date, contract date, payment date or settlement date.

segment.name: Financial institution information
segment.documentation: FII, A segment to specify the identity of the domestic financial institution related to a specific flow of amount related to the transaction.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to specify the identification of the transaction counterpart.

segment.name: Organisation classification details
segment.documentation: SPR, A segment to specify the industrial sector of activity of the transaction counterpart.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to specify countries related to the transaction, such as the country of origin or destination of goods, the direct investment country, the donation acting country, the payment transaction country (creditor or debtor) or the country in which the construction work is done.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments to specify references and reference dates related to the transaction or to the loan.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to specify the reference number of a document related to the transaction.

segment.name: Date/time/period
segment.documentation: DTM, A segment to specify the date and time of the reference of the document related to the transaction.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments to specify the transaction amount and any related currencies.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment to specify the amount of the transaction and the relevant currency.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment to specify the reference currency and the target currency of the transaction when they are different.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments to specify the details related to transactions on financial securities.

segment.name: Related identification numbers
segment.documentation: GIR, A segment to identify the type of security (shares, bonds, etc).

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, A segment to specify the quantity of the security.

segment.name: Price details
segment.documentation:
PRI, A segment to specify the face value of the security.
4.1.2 Detail section
Information to be provided in the Detail section:

segment.name: Section control
segment.documentation:
UNS, A service segment placed at the start of the detail section to avoid collisions.
Part 2: direct reporting of transactions via accounts held with non-residents, reporting of BOP-related surveys and of foreign assets and liabilities.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments to accommodate the details relevant either for all types of reporting forms on positions (foreign assets and liabilities) or for all types of BOP related surveys.

segment.name: Reference
segment.documentation: RFF, A segment to specify either the type of reporting form (e.g. on trade credits) or the type of survey.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments to specify relevant information either for a type of reporting form on a position (foreign assets and liabilities) or for a type of BOP related survey.

segment.name: Requirements and conditions
segment.documentation: RCS, A segment to specify the type of the account or the type of reporting form.

segment.name: Free text
segment.documentation: FTX, A segment to specify free text information relating to the type of information or report.

segment.name: Currencies
segment.documentation: CUX, A segment to specify the currency of the reported account.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments to specify the amount and other details relevant to the account position or to any related Balance of Payment surveys.

segment.name: Monetary amount
segment.documentation: MOA, A segment specifying the monetary amount of the position or flow that has been requested.

segment.name: Name and address
segment.documentation: NAD, A segment to specify the identification of a party related to the transaction.

segment.name: Place/location identification
segment.documentation: LOC, A segment to specify the country of the debtor or creditor.

segmentGroup.documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments to specify the details related to transactions on financial securities.

segment.name: Related identification numbers
segment.documentation: GIR, A segment to identify the type of security such as shares or bonds.

segment.name: Quantity
segment.documentation: QTY, A segment to specify the quantity of the security.

segment.name: Price details
segment.documentation:
PRI, A segment to specify the face value of the security.
4.1.3 Summary section
Information to be provided in the Summary section:

segment.name: Control total
segment.documentation: CNT, A segment to specify total values for control purposes.
